column3: but Snooze is a little too hyped up. The food is good
column4: yes. BUT nothing I'd order again. The chicken pot pie became soft fast and the eggs Benedict isn't different from others I've tried before. Actually
column5: would order the French toast again. That was the perfect amount of sweetness and paired well with the fruit. I just don't know if I'd spend another hour in line to order it though.
